Darkfate:

"A bat probe is there..." said the male "It inform me that Trainers, 
Maximals, Decepticons and Alliance is there"


Darkfta typed some buttons and a screen showed what was going on in 
CF, the same things that bat probe saw... Now it was showing Slayer 
and zoe "Hummm..." said Darkfate "The male attaked us some days 
ago... I don't meet the femme..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest nods, agreeing with Darkfate about KitKat acting weird (I 
think I forgot to post that untill now) when he recieves Megaton's 
transmission. He frowns, repying. "Who's the enemy there?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Megaton spits the armor plates aside taking a claw to pluck the 
last one
> > between his teeth, "I can't help it, it must be the Predacon in 
me."
> > 
> > Just then shots came from a different direction (Blots) :"What's 
this?" the
> > Dragon blurted. He knew by now the shields were up and the shots 
wouldn't
> > hurt anything but if there were other attackers it was up to him 
to prove
> > his faith by defending the Maximals in any way he could.   His 
distraction
> > nearly cost him as Zoes shots struck him.(What type of weapon is 
Zoe
> > useing?) The scales on his face protected him but the shots 
reminded him of
> > what the cost of distraction was.
> > 
> > He lifted his mighty foot and stomped on the ground sending a 
shockwave in
> > the direction of  Zoe and Slayer. His whole body was a physical 
weapon and
> > he knew how to use it well.
> > 
> > He'd lied about being a leader but knew that the faction at the 
Black
> > Fortress was behind his decision for the sideing between the two 
teams
> > "MegaTON to Black Fortress, I need any available Predacons to 
assist me at
> > the Cybertronian Fire." he shouted. In his mind he could handle 
this alone,
> > he was after all the "invincible" fighting machine. He just 
figured that a
> > show of force from the Predacon side would be more convincing.
